name: Terror Time
description:
"Terror Time" is a classic tower defense game in an unusual and bright setting. Defend the base and get upgrade points.

Hordes of enemies will try to break through the defenses. Give them a hard fight with Terror Time. Protect the approaches to your base, withstand several attacks using 10 types of cool weapons with the possibility of their improvements.

Game Features:
  • Classic gameplay
  • 10 levels
  • 10 types of towers
  • 10 kinds of enemies
  • Steam Achievements support
